aws_route53_resolver_endpoint.description: Provides a Route 53 Resolver endpoint resource.

direction.description: The direction of DNS queries to or from the Route 53 Resolver endpoint.

ip_address.description: The subnets and IP addresses in your VPC that you want DNS queries to pass through on the way from your VPCs

security_group_ids.description: The ID of one or more security groups that you want to use to control access to this VPC.

name.description: The friendly name of the Route 53 Resolver endpoint.

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the resource.

subnet_id.description: The ID of the subnet that contains the IP address.

ip.description: The IP address in the subnet that you want to use for DNS queries.

id.description: The ID of the Route 53 Resolver endpoint.

arn.description: The ARN of the Route 53 Resolver endpoint.

host_vpc_id.description: The ID of the VPC that you want to create the resolver endpoint in.
